alert.note: Alert for Lander (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 12:20PM PDT until May 24 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lander County in north central Nevada... * Until 100 PM PDT. * At 1220 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Argenta, moving north at 10 mph. This storm will be going over I- 80 near Argenta. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Argenta and Mule Canyon Reclamation Project and portions of I-80 near Argenta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
